contractDisagree.title: We can't proceed without you agreement
contractDisagree.detail: Do you have questions? Call us or visit us at a branch.

help.title: Do you need help?
help.bulletsHeadline: We can do more at a branch

iconBullets.text: Choose standing orders and direct debits to transfer
Inform other institutions about the change
iconBullets.detail: Employer, state organizations, energy supplier, mobile carrier, ...

intro.title: How do we proceed?

iconBullets.detail: We can do transferring standing orders, direct debits and old account termination

intro.detail: We will let you know when we are done with the changes

settings.title: What do you want to arrange?
settings.transferStandingOrders: Transfer standing orders and direct debits
settings.dropSourceAccount: Terminate old account and transfer balance
settings.detail: Do you need to transfer funds without terminating old account, choose which standing orders and direct debits to transfer, or announce change to third parties? Visit us at a branch.

timing.title: Transfer from which date?
timing.dateFooter: We recommend choosing a day on which there are no incoming or outgoing standing orders.
timing.dateError: Date has to be a workday

originalBank.title: This day at your old bank

conditionalBullets.detail: Money is available until day of termination. After that day they are transferred to your account at us.

conditionalBullets.text: Old bank card stops working probably
Standing orders and direct debits stop working
Standing orders and direct debits will be active on the accout at us
conditionalBullets.detail: With the same settings as you are used to

oldAccount.title: Enter the old account number at your current bank

loader.title: Just a moment
loader.detail: We need to check your data.

summary.title: Summary
summary.consentTitle: I agree that Moneta will communicate unencrypted via e-mail and phone
summary.consentDetail: This guarantees simple notification about the process completion
summary.transferStandingOrders: Transfer of standing orders and direct debits
summary.dropSourceAccount: Terminate the old account and transfer remaining balance

victory.title: Done!
victory.detail: We are sending your request to the old bank. You can find it in the documents section of Smart Banka and in your e-mail inbox. We'll let you know when it's processed.

transferStandingOrdersBullets.text: Transfer money to new account for upcoming payments

bullets.detail: Employer, state payers, energy providers, cellular carrier, ...
On the chosen day, your old card stops working

bullets.text: If you have liabilities at the old bank, arrange a new payment method
